attributes.action: Give Serious Offenders the option to work for food.. Otherwise they dont get anything!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Convicts should work.. Hard.. The taxpayer should only have to pay for the food , water and shelter of those that do work. 
If they are able to work and dont work then they should not get these luxuries(Luxuries? , yes millions of people in the world see these 3 basic items as luxuries while criminals in this country get a free ride)
